content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: IDVAR
      operator: empty
    - name: IDVARVAL
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SENDIG.118
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: IDVAR must be specified.
Outcome:
  Message: IDVARVAL may not be populated as IDVAR is null
  Output Variables:
    - IDVARVAL
    - IDVAR
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SENDIG
        Version: '3.1'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SENDIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: '118'
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: IDVARVAL is used only when individual comments are
                  related to domain records. Cannot be populated if IDVAR is null.
                Document: IG v3.1
                Item: Specification
                Section: 5.2.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - CO

Outcome.Message: IDVARVAL may not be populated as IDVAR is null

Citations.Cited_Guidance: IDVARVAL is used only when individual comments are related to domain records. Cannot be populated if IDVAR is null.
